attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to have the new Hip law for selling property banned. IT IS A USLESS LAW MADE TO MAKE vat FOR THE GOVETMENT SERVES NO PURPOSE,

I have spent 370-00 last week this week I wish to withdraw my as property is not selling at the moment  i HAVE BEEN ROBBED.  £370-00 FOR ONE WEEK.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
